skills.name: REJUVENATION
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 65% Chance to Heal all allies on Perfect Attacks.

skills.name: RECKONING
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• Drain HP of enemies to all allies for 2 turns.
• 50% Chance to grant an Extra Turn to a random ally.

skills.name: LIFE AFTER DEATH
desc: • Instantly Revive Self with 60% HP upon death..
